    • Method Detail

      • conversation

        public java.lang.String conversation(java.lang.String input)
        Method to handle the conversation with the chatbot. If necessary, this method calls the loadExtensions(List) to instantiate the bot and afterwards to instantiate the chatSession for a Chat.multisentenceRespond(String).

      • stopConversation

        public boolean stopConversation()
        Method to stop a bot conversation and save aiml and aimlif from the chatbot brain
        Returns:
        true if bot was instantiated before and false otherwise

      • createCategoryAndTopicAndContentByNames

                                                        java.lang.String contentValue,

        Method to create a Category, Topic and a Content all at once. This is used by the ExtensionBrainSetAndGet.

        categoryName -

        multiple -
        Returns:
        the created Category or null
